entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
